headline: Istanbul (not Constantinople): Cloudflareâ€™s 124th Data Center
keywords: Cloudflare Network, Data Center, Europe, Asia, March of Cloudflare
description: Cloudflare is excited to turn up our newest data center in Istanbul, Turkey. This is our 124th data center globally (and 62nd country), and it is throwing a curveball in our data center by continent tracking. Istanbul is the only city in the world to span two continents: Europe and Asia.
